verses.name: Acts 28:1
verses.text: And when they were escaped, then they knew that the island was called Melita.

verses.name: Acts 28:2
verses.text: And the barbarous people shewed us no little kindness: for they kindled a fire, and received us every one, because of the present rain, and because of the cold.

verses.name: Acts 28:3
verses.text: And when Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks, and laid them on the fire, there came a viper out of the heat, and fastened on his hand.
